name: Pavel
title: Wizard of Ice Dragon

Every 9.5 sec, deals 332% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.

soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Dragon Hearts, Andarta Andraste, increasing own Crit DMG by 100% for 10 sec. Upon activation, deals ??? M.DMG to enemies in a straight line, increasing M.DMG the target takes by 30% for 10 sec, and inflicting Freeze for 6 sec. Upon attacking the frozen enemy, deals ??? M.DMG that ignores DEF, self recovers 2 orbs of Mana, and reduces Cooldown of all skills by 30%.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 4 times.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Increases DMG 80% and dispels positiv effects from the hit enemy.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.

skills.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, Freeze duration is boosted by 5 sec.

skills.dark: Target changes to the enemy with the highest ATK.

dark: Every 3 sec, attacks all enemies and deals 50% of ATK as M.DMG, inflicting Frost with 50% chance. Enemies already inflicted with Frost takes 300% of ATK as M.DMG over time for 3 sec.

background.story: A curious case of a human wizard possessed by the soul of an ice dragon. Having fought alongside Kyle 100 years ago, this ancient ice wizard has actually existed far before even then. The dragon's soul is usually asleep, but wakes up occasionally to speak to him in the voice of a lover. The empire considers him a key figure, and has dispatched Rodina to monitor and protect him. He himself, however, only wishes to live in peace and quiet, away from the concerns of the world.

itemIntroductions.weapon: Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the Demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.
itemIntroductions.soul:
An ominous wave of mana stroked the dragon's heart.

Lewisia had told Pavel about the situation in Orvel, and how Kasel turned into a dark lord. Pavel let out his rage onto the cruel reality, and his freezing fury fiercely permeated throughout the air.
The strong vibration of the soul was powerful enough to break the barrier containing immense mana to ensure comfortable rest to the two dragons.

Ultimately, Andarta and Andraste resonated with Pavel's freezing fury, and appeared with their gigantic wings.
treasures: A snow crystal in an ancient form, and a home of the winter elementals. Its beauty imprisons weak minds in an eternal blizzard. Dragons Andarta and Andraste gave this to Pavel after he made their wish come true. It also consoled his lonely heart during his solitary stay in Windland until Rodina came along.

The dragon of ice gifted this brooch to a young Pavel, and imbued it with its breath. But after the dragon of ice and Pavel became one, it reminds Pavel to not leave him. It can inflict pain that pierces the heart. Imbues a chill to Pavel's mana, making his magic even sharper.
Frozen blood of the winter spirit. Pavel found it deep inside the Ice Cave and made it into earrings. A harsh chill and severe pain can be felt from it, but it increases Pavel's mana to its limit.

A present that a possessed female Dragon gave to Pavel. The Ice Dragon always gave him all kinds of gifts, whether Pavel liked it or not. This orb was one of them, and it has a little part of her soul imbued in it.
